TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {5022=According to our research of Colorado and other state lists there were 2 registered sex offenders living in Monument, Colorado as of July 31, 2015. The ratio of number of residents in Monument to the number of sex offenders is 2,871 to 1. The number of registered sex offenders compared to the number of residents in this city is a lot smaller than the state average., 131722=Monument: Downtown Monument September 2002, 23863=Incorporated on 5/14/1881}
